title: Sai Thai
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Thai food restaurant a 3-page vegetable/vegetarian section on its menu, of which many are vegan suitable. Dishes with egg or oyster sauce are marked, and the staff understand what vegan is. Meat substitutes are used in the vegan dishes. Sometimes there is only one waitress so expect a wait. House specialty drinks are fruit tea and coconut water.
streetAddress: 1 Cyrildene Centre, Corner Marcia and Derrick Avenues, Cyrildene
